metadata.name: In the Fantasy of the Man I Am
metadata.description:
SILENT ROAD 

A body of works about particular life stages that deals with self discovery, reoccurring mistakes, and past memories. 

1. In the Fantasy of the Man I Am

His gaze pierces cloud and dust 
Into the realm of unimaginable 
A life that have never before lived
How will he know he’s survives?

Whirlpool of sorrows
Driven by the same mistakes
In a new direction, he wishes
In a new direction, he pleads
In a new direction…

…how will i know that it’s right?
